item.title: 5 tyres in the ditch, 24th August
item.description:
Heading right from the A38, along the b4123, there are 5 used car tyres located within the ditch, 50 yards of the road sign with deer Hurs/ oddas chapel. Use the coordinates 51.9591766, -2.1687316
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4213, Deerhurst, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracks along footpath on the green at top of Lavender Road / Bluebell Road, 24th August
item.description:
On the footpath that runs across the green at the top of Lavender Road / Bluebell Road. The cracks run for several metres along the path. There are long cracks in the footpath surface which have been noticeable for the past few weeks and seem to have worsened during the hot weather. The gaps are wide enough that a dog’s paw could get caught and they could also catch a bicycle wheel. The path is still usable but it would be safer if repaired before it deteriorates further. Photos attached show the damage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Lavender Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Electric Scooters - Parking completely blocking footpath, 24th August
item.description:
The bank of scooters that are parked outside Cheltenham train station opposite Tesco Express. This completely blocks my ability to get a baby pushchair through, it’s also difficult crossing. I have a blind neighbour who I have seen walking that route which is bound to be difficult for her guide dog to navigate safely. I have attached a photo for record.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Queen's Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Red crosses painted on zebra crossing, 24th August
item.description:
There are red crosses painted on the zebra crossing outside of Bournside school. Seen on Saturday morning 23rd August. There is a post in the Hatherley & Warden Hill Community Facebook page supporting this action and listing other locations including Farmfield Road and Moorend Park Road, the post was made on Friday.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Warden Hill Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No Dogs Allowed signs missing, 23rd August
item.description:
On the gates of the play park near Desert Orchid Road in Prestbury there used to be signs saying no dogs allowed. Over time these have disappeared and there are sometimes people inside the park with their dogs when children are playing. Can some signs be reinstated please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Midnight Court, Tewkesbury

item.title: Abandoned vehicle fire damaged, 23rd August
item.description:
Vehicle fire evening of 8/8/2025. Fire Brigade attended. Reported to county and borough councillor 9/8/2025. Reported to landowner of fence and land to rear as fence is badly damaged. Landowner notified police and they attended 11/08/2025. Vehicle is still there. This is a GCC owned lay-by. Please will GCC contact police and insurance company and get this removed asap. This lay-by is frequented by camper vans and restrictions should be placed on it - eg No Overnight Parking. This was an incident we knew would happen and could have been significantly worse if grass and gardens/shed etc had caught fire.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface along a large section of road appalling, 23rd August
item.description:
The surface of the road at the Salisbury Avenue end of farmfield Road and for a large stretch of the road is appalling. As the bus route is about to change and buses will no longer travel along that road, please can you look at resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Farmfield Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
